jobDescription: Senior Scientist, Pharmacokinetics  We are an innovative, well-established and growing biotechnology company located in Monrovia, CA. Our focus is to develop superior antibodies and therapeutics for autoimmune disorders, diseases and cancer. Our employees are the most important factor in our success as we have assembled a highly talented group and look forward to adding to this amazing team as we seek an experienced and passionate, PK/PD Scientist. Top Reasons to Work with Us
